title: My Immortality It’s in a Death Game - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Sci-fi   Seinen
tags: Immortals   Loner Protagonist   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   R-15   Survival Game   Virtual Reality
author: 利根川 流
description:
It's a game of death once you've logged in. While the other players around him cry, Karma starts to capture the game – because he can’t die!

As a result of his reputation/title and playing style,  Karma receives a damage withstanding body!

Before anyone knew this, Immortal and the Guild, members that surround him – and a slime – becomes one of the select few Guilds in the game that push the capture forward.  

※ Karma is basically a solo player.

※ I said it many times but even if the surroundings are life- threatening there is hardly any danger to him.>
